On January&#160;30, 2020 , Amazon.com, Inc. announced its fourth quarter 2019 and year ended December&#160;31, 2019 financial results. A copy of the press release containing the announcement is included as Exhibit 99.1 and additional information regarding the inclusion of non-GAAP financial measures in certain of Amazon.com, Inc.&#8217;s public disclosures, including its fourth quarter 2019 and year ended December&#160;31, 2019 financial results announcement, is included as Exhibit 99.2. Both of these exhibits are incorporated herein by reference. ITEM&#160;9.01.&#160;&#160;FINANCIAL&#160;STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS.
